LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Despised.label: despised
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Despised.description:
Our colony is only temporary, should we stay it will only be a matter of time before we are unable to defend it, it is better to never gain such comfort.

<color=#E5E54C>Stats:</color>
 - Farming yield: -10%.
 - Gathering yield: +40%.
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Desired.label: desired
LanguageData.VME_PermanentBases_Desired.description:
Our colony should become our forever home, the more buildings, paths, and lights we can erect the better off we’ll all be.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colonists gets mood penalties / bonuses depending on amount of buildings on the map. "Building" is a completely enclosed structure with at least 25 tiles size.
